about_the_game:
"Storm Swordsman" is a sword fighting action game that includes Soul-like minion battles and Mega Man-like boss battles.
In the game, the player will play a wandering swordsman "Tetsu Nishino", who accepts the entrustment of his friend "Hachiro Yoshioka" who has not seen him for many years, to carry out a state secret assassination mission.

This game is just like a shounen manga. There will be a large number of swordsmen and warriors. Each character has a distinct personality and has its own unique skills.
Players must find ways to deal with their different powerful martial arts, so the boss battles in this game are never boring.


According to intelligence, the four city lords are preparing to rebel to overthrow King Honmyo, and the player must assassinate the four city lords before the rebellion occurs. Along the way, players will engage in deathmatch with ninjutsu and sword masters in the Honmyo Kingdom.
Will the player be able to complete the difficult missions or will they be killed by the knife? Or will it continue to become stronger and eventually become the strongest swordsman?

The story of "Storm Swordsman" takes place in "Honmyo Kingdom of Clandie Continent". There are 12 areas and 5 castles in the game that need to be conquered, and each area has a powerful BOSS waiting for players to challenge.
It is not easy to conquer 5 castles alone, can the young swordsman survive to the end? A mutiny and a mission, what will the young swordsman experience and change, what will be the final outcome?

▉ Game Battle
The combat moves that can be carried out are,
Jump, Dash, Defense, Light Slash, Heavy Slash, Backstab, Counterattack, and five skills.
Players have three values ​​of physical strength, vigor, and endurance.
And thirty skill scrolls that can change abilities can be equipped.
Players need to make good use of these skill combinations to fight against a variety of powerful opponents!


▉ Game Characters
The role played by the player, the partner who performs the assassination mission.
And all kinds of masters blocking in front of the player.


▉ Operation Method
Mainly XBOX Controller
【A】jump . 【X】Light Slash .
【Y】Heavy Slash、Backstab . 【B】Tiger Shadow .
【RB】skill set . 【RT】Sprint . 【LB】Menu . 【LT】Defense .
【RB+A】Tiger Chong . 【RB+X】Tiger Teeth .
【RB+Y】Tiger Claw . 【RB+B】Tiger Shadow Kill . 【LT+RT】Counterattack .


▉ Common Problem
【1】 It is prompted that "○○.dll" does not exist at startup.
Please try installing the "Trial Version" of "Pixel Game Maker MV".

【2】How to open the setting menu.
While the game is running, press the "F1" key to display the menu bar at the top.

【3】How to set language and configure buttons.
When the game is running, press "F1" to open the setting menu, where you can make settings.

short_description: This is a 2D action adventure game of stealth assassination, swordsmanship and ninjutsu duel! There is no refreshing combo, and there is no Wushuang who mows the grass. hesitates will not lose, but carelessness will die! In the world of swordsmen, the victory or defeat is in the blink of an eye!
